parameter.value: Welcome, human |PLAYERNAME|, to our humble abode.
Farewell, stranger. May Uman open your minds and your hearts to Daraman's wisdom!
Farewell, stranger. May Uman open your minds and your hearts to Daraman's wisdom!
Have patience, |PLAYERNAME|. In this world every grain of sand has its place and its time. You may have found the place you have been looking for, but it is not yet your time.
